# Address book entitlement

**Property List Key**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the app may have read-write access to contacts in the user’s address book.

## Discussion

To add this entitlement to your app, enable the App Sandbox capability in Xcode and then select Contacts, or enable the Hardened Runtime capability and then select Address Book.

## Personal information

- **Location entitlement**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the app may access location information from Location Services.
- **Calendars entitlement**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the app may have read-write access to the user’s calendar.
- **Photos Library Entitlement**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the app has read-write access to the user’s Photos library.
